author: Special Correspondent
text:
Customs officers of the Air Intelligence Unit held an air passenger at the Tiruchi international airport on Monday night after they found gold weighing 140 grams concealed in the rectum.

The passenger Syed Ali of Chennai landed Tiruchi from Kuala Lumpur by Malindo Air flight when Customs officials on suspicion detained him for questioning.

Airport sources said 24-carat gold cut into three pieces was found concealed in the rectum.

The value of the smuggled gold was put at Rs. 4.5 lakh.
title: Gold found in air passenger’s rectum
